snippet.title: Bloodless | Alpha Gameplay Teaser #SBGames2020
snippet.description:
Play Bloodless Combat Prototype | https://pointnsheep.itch.io/bloodless

Bloodless is an action-adventure indiegame with pixelart visuals inspired by the feudal Japan's Edo period in development by Point N’ Sheep game studio.

The story follows a former samurai in a journey to end the reign of violence of her former master and shogun. After witnessing all the blood that a blade can shed, the mysterious ronin decided to eschew his sword and confront her old allies with nothing but bare fists; disarming them with a timed counter-dash hybrid mechanic.

Follow Point N’ Sheep for project updates!

- Twitter | https://twitter.com/pointnsheep
- Facebook | https://www.facebook.com/pointnsheep
- Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/pointnsheep/
